mapper.select: SELECT cc.client_company_name AS clientCompanyName, c.campaign_name AS campaignName, c.product_name AS productName, picm.youtube_link AS youtubeLink, picm.instagram_link AS instagramLink FROM pipeline_influencer_client_manager picm JOIN pipeline p ON picm.pipeline_id = p.pipeline_id JOIN campaign c ON p.campaign_id = c.campaign_id JOIN client_company cc ON c.client_company_id = cc.client_company_id WHERE picm.influencer_id = #{influencerId}
